description: Asynchronous faults in the instance faults table do not show error tracebacks. We should be showing more information about the Exception in order to assist with debugging. We do not want to give too much information to an end user so we should also distinguish between an admin and normal user and show information accordingly.
title: Asynchronous faults do not show traceback

comments.content: Asynchronous faults in the instance faults table do not show error tracebacks. We should be showing more information about the Exception in order to assist with debugging. We do not want to give too much information to an end user so we should also distinguish between an admin and normal user and show information accordingly.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alex-meade
